Vakum 8 Tahun, Band Rage Against The Machine Bakal Reuni 2020
02 Nov 2019, 19:45 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Rage Against The Machine akan sapa penggemar tahun depan di sejumlah festival musik di AS. (Foto: Wikimedia Commons/Penner)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Band Rage Against The Machine dikabarkan akan kembali tampil di atas panggung pada 2020. Salah satu ikon band rock ini disebut-sebut akan tampil dalam festival musik tahunan Amerika Serikat, Coachella Festival.Melansir NME, kabar tersebut disampaikan melalui unggahan di akun Instagram resmi Rage Against The Machine dengan keterangan mereka akan tampil di El Paso pada 26 Maret 2020, lalu di Las Cruces dan Phoenix pada 28 Maret dan 30 Maret 2020.Mereka pun akan tampil di Coachella pada 10 dan 17 April 2020. Informasi serupa juga diunggah sang gitaris Tom Morello di Instagram pribadinya pada awal pekan ini.



Rage Against The Machine yang populer di era 90-an terakhir kali tampil bersama pada 2011. Selama masa vakum, sang gitaris Tom Morello, bassis Tim Commerford dan penggebuk drum Brad Wilk juga aktif dalam grup Prophets of Rage bersama rapper Chuck D.Kabar kembalinya Rage Against The Machine bertolak belakang dengan permintaan Morello beberapa waktu lalu kepada penggemar untuk tak menantikan comeback mereka."Tidak ada berita terbaru tentang Rage Against The Machine. Jangan menantikan Rage Against The Machine. Bentuk band-mu sendiri," kata Morello kepada HardDrive beberapa waktu lalu.

8 Years Vacuum, Band Rage Against The Machine Will Reunion 2020
02 Nov 2019, 19:45 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Rage Against The Machine will greet fans next year at a number of music festivals in the US. (Photo: Wikimedia Commons / Penner)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Band Rage Against The Machine is rumored to be back on stage in 2020. One of the rock band's icons is said to be performing at the annual music festival of the United States, Coachella Festival. Launching NME, the news was conveyed through uploads on the official Instagram account Rage Against The Machine with the statement they will appear in El Paso on March 26, 2020, then in Las Cruces and Phoenix on March 28 and March 30, 2020. They will also appear on Coachella on 10 and 17 April 2020. Similar information also uploaded the guitarist Tom Morello on his personal Instagram earlier this week.



Rage Against The Machine, which was popular in the 90s, last performed together in 2011. During the vacuum, guitarist Tom Morello, bassist Tim Commerford and drummer Brad Wilk were also active in the Prophets of Rage group with rapper Chuck D. The news of Rage's return Against The Machine is contrary to Morello's request some time ago to fans not to wait for their comeback. "There is no latest news about Rage Against The Machine. Don't wait for Rage Against The Machine. Form your own band," Morello told HardDrive some time then.
